physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Constant, intense bilateral contractions of the orbicularis oculi and oromandibular hypermotility.
Normal findings from routine laboratory examinations, tensilon test, two EEGs, and a CT scan.
Increased spasm intensity with shortness of breath accompanying the blepharospasm.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Right finger temperature range during the initial thermal feedback session was from 92.0°F to 92.3°F.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: EMG potential ranged from 100 to 200 µV; potential during relaxed periods was between 10 and 20 µV.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, blepharospasm intensity was high at the start of sessions but decreased, with Ms.A being free from spasm for up to 30 minutes during the last sessions.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Shortness of breath was relieved, but blepharospasm did not reduce significantly.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Complained that the blepharospasm increased at home.
